website_summaries.verdict: A quality Care Bear plush that also laughs, providing lots of playtime fun.
pros: Available in Cheer Bear and Share Bear
Tickle the bear's tummy to hear her laugh
Easy enough for even young children to make giggle
Very soft and featuring bright colors
cons: Some didn't like the laugh sound

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 month old and she LOVES it! It's very easy for her to "tickle" it's tummy to get it to laugh, and she's amazed at her abilities to do so Lol. I love that Care Bears are still around!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Chanel West Coast Bear
customer_reviews.text: Sure it’s a cute bear and my daughter loves it but it drives us crazy. The giggling is so repetitive, it gives me Chanel west coast vibes(girl from Ridiculousness). I mean if you can stand her laugh and want your child to be happy then get it. You’ve been warned.
customer_reviews.author: ThighQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great toy to anyone that loves the Care Bears
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy, it's one of her favorites! She loves the giggling sounds from Cheer Bear. It's like a Care Bear version of Tickle Me Elmo. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bluffnix

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This care bear is adorable. My granddaughter loves hugging it. The look of joy on her face when she opened it was priceless!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece's 4th birthday. Can't wait to see her reaction, I'm sure she's going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wietgrefe

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 3 year old's birthday. It very sensitive to the touch. The laugh sounds cute and the bear is still pretty soft. Over all a very happy 3 year old :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Downing

customer_reviews.title: My niece love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bear for my niece and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for little girl
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, so cute. A little piece of my childhood I am going to give to my daughter on her upcoming birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and as soon as I opened it, there was a rip. For it being $20 it’s pretty disappointing see that it cane damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Made very well.
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old grandson loves Care Bears. The colors are bright and he easily found the giggles spot-on the tummy. He laughs and carries it with him. I found it to be made very well with good sticking. Very soft and cuddling.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Lovett

customer_reviews.title: Best gift Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my niece’s birthday. She is in LOVE with it! Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.author: KatieJ

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece. She loves it! Great companion to sleep with
customer_reviews.author: Pat Kotas

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approves
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bear. It is super soft and not too big for a toddler
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Rubeck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this best and loves that it laughs
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Check out the different sales representives for the Care Bears before purchace
customer_reviews.text: The Bear was cute but had a creepy laugh. the box it was shipped in looked like it had gone thru some wet weather. It could have been packed better for shipping. Bran
customer_reviews.author: Bran

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. The little giggle is precious. Our daughter absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this care bear. It has the sweetest sounding giggle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter. She loves it and it has held up well, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hennington

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter loves her care bear. Will purchase more
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my cousin daughter, and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Auston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!!! Super fast shipping, super happy little girl!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

product_meta.title: Care Bears Hug & Giggle Feature Cheer Plush
product_meta.description: Spread the laughter and fun with the Care Bears Hug and Giggle Plush Cheer Bear. Tickle Cheer's belly to make her giggle! This sweet bear is made with super soft and huggable fabrics. Cheer will have your little one laughing and playing for hours! Collect both Hug and Giggle Cheer Bear and Hug and Giggle Share Bear for a super silly time! Each bear sold separately. Ages 3+
feature_bullets: Spread the laughter and fun with the Care Bears Hug and Giggle Plush Cheer Bear. Tickle Cheer's belly to make her giggle! This sweet bear is made with super soft and huggable fabrics. Cheer will have your little one laughing and playing for hours! Collect both Hug and Giggle Cheer Bear and Hug and Giggle Share Bear for a super silly time! Each bear sold separately. Ages 3+
Spread the laughter and fun with the Care Bears Hug and Giggle Plush Cheer Bear.
Made with super soft and huggable fabrics.
Cheer will have your little one laughing and playing for hours!
Collect both Hug and Giggle Cheer Bear and Hug and Giggle Share Bear. Each bear sold separately.
